text: Visiting Hours is a 1982 Canadian horror movie directed by Jean-Claude Lord and starring Lee Grant, Michael Ironside, Linda Purl, William Shatner, Harvey Atkin, Lenore Zann. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 horror movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jean-Claude Lord
title: Visiting Hours
